meanings.definition: The act of making a noise like a duck.
meanings.sent1: The quacking of the ducks in the pond was loud.
meanings.sent2: I heard the quacking of the ducks as I walked by the lake.
meanings.sent3: The quacking of the ducks interrupted the peaceful silence of the park.
meanings.sent4: The constant quacking of the ducks became the soundtrack of the afternoon.
meanings.sent5: The quacking of the ducks echoed through the still air, creating a serene atmosphere.

meanings.definition: Describing something that makes a noise like a duck.
meanings.sent1: The quacking sound coming from the toy duck was amusing.
meanings.sent2: The quacking noise from the pond was a familiar sound.
meanings.sent3: The quacking alarm clock woke me up with a start.
meanings.sent4: The quacking ringtone on his phone always made people smile.
meanings.sent5: The quacking toy in the store caught the attention of the children.
